attributes.title: THIS APP IS SO BAD
attributes.review: so difficult to use and overall very disturbing please do not download this app it shouldn’t even be on the app store HIGHLY DANGEROUS

attributes.title: I-
attributes.review: i came for some Cheetos and was greeted by the man himself 🤭 I couldn’t wait to talk to the king of harr until I saw him with a another woman, *gasps* “HOW COULD YOU DONALD?!” “ur mom” I felt so hurt 😭

attributes.title: This app is awful
attributes.review: The design is appalling. The creator is disgusting. Trump, let Gen Z have TikTok or else we will keep coming for you.

attributes.title: WORST APP EVER.
attributes.review: if i could give this app zero stars i would. i don’t even know why this ridiculously awful app is even on the app store. D I S G U S T I N G.

attributes.title: Cheetos why name this app Trump?
attributes.review: I really don’t know why Cheetos is going so far to rename their product to trump and run this facist app.

attributes.title: Horrible
attributes.review: I had a heart attack when I opened this app,not even trolling

attributes.title: Disgusting and ashamed🤦‍♀️
attributes.review: I opened the app and was confronted with a big Cheeto. Sir you need to remove yourself from the office. Cheeto man gave me nightmares. I need counseling now.

attributes.title: Gross
attributes.review: This app is a serious threat to the health and safety of thousands of people. It makes me sick to my stomach to open this app and see a nasty, wrinkly, cheeto staring back at me. NOT GOOD

attributes.title: Delete This Please
attributes.review: can’t go to sleep tonight because i’m afraid i’ll see a cheeto in front of me😭😭

attributes.title: Horrible app
attributes.review: If it wasn’t for this app I would still have my pet caterpillar...
